description: This file defines a ViewModel class 'NoteDetailViewModel' for managing the creation and editing of individual notes within an Android application. It interacts with a NotesRepository to load and save notes, using Kotlin coroutines for asynchronous operations. The ViewModel exposes a reactive StateFlow to observe the current note state.

classes.name: NoteDetailViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel for creating/editing a single note, providing methods to load and save note data asynchronously.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads a note by its ID asynchronously and updates the observable note state.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves a new note or updates an existing one asynchronously, invoking a callback with the note's ID after saving.
